perturbation.original_text: 1.07 Books and Records. All books and records maintained or required by applicable Law to be maintained by each of the Parties  hereto in connection with the Transaction Documents and the GIE, including to the extent any of the following exist: (i) hard  copy and microfiche records; (ii) all paper files; (iii) all electronic images; (iv) all computer data files; and (v) any and all records  in other forms.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.07 Books and Records. All records, regardless of format, maintained by each of the Parties.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition lists specific examples, making it clear that records in various forms, including electronic data, are within the scope. The changed definition removes the specificity, raising concerns if regulatory requirements are met.

perturbation.original_text: 1.20 GIE Fees. The fees due to either PHLVIC or PLIC, as applicable, by a Certificate Owner under a Certificate for coverage under  such Certificate.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.20 GIE Fees. The fees due to either PHLVIC or PLIC, as applicable, by a Certificate Owner.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the phrase 'under a Certificate for coverage under such Certificate', the modified definition does not specify which certificate the fees are related to.

perturbation.original_text: 14.02 Arbitration. All controversies, claims or disputes among the Parties arising out of or relating to this Agreement, either of  the Master Group Annuity Contracts, or breach of any of them, including matters relating to formation, shall be settled by binding  arbitration by the American Arbitration Association in accordance with its Commercial Arbitration Rules and Title 9 of the U.S.  Code. The place of arbitration shall be Hartford, Connecticut.
perturbation.changed_text: 14.02 Arbitration. All controversies, claims or disputes among the Parties arising out of or relating to this Agreement shall be settled by binding arbitration. The place of arbitration shall be determined by the arbitrator.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause explicitly defines the arbitration process with the American Arbitration Association. By removing these processes, it creates confusion if the same processes apply.
